Feud of Fire

The year is 2025, the world is in turmoil, Europe has centralized under one great Alliance, the USA has collapsed due to a mixture of its own inflated currency and inability to keep revolutionary forces under control, while the Middle East has formed into one Caliphate and fights for domination of trade. The two great powers have now clashed for complete control of the great well of resources that the now weak USA has to offer.
